title: Easy tomato pasta sauce
ingredients: ['2 tablespoons olive oil', '1 large onion, chopped', '2 cloves garlic, minced', '2 sticks celery, chopped', '3 (400g) tins chopped tomatoes', '175g tomato puree', '2 teaspoons dried parsley', '1 teaspoon dried basil', '1 teaspoon dried oregano', 'salt and pepper to taste']
